amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that the Department of Defense retains its statutory authority to provide new military recruits a small cash voucher that they can use to purchase running shoes for training.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 114-623 to ensure that the Department of Defense retains its statutory authority to provide new military recruits a small cash voucher that they can use to purchase running shoes for training.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 265 (Roll no. 313).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 265 (Roll no. 313).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Sanford.
